001package com.github.sormuras.bach.builder;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Configuration;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Grabber;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolFinder;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
010import java.io.File;
011import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor.Version;
012import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
013import java.nio.file.Files;
014import java.nio.file.Path;
015import java.util.ArrayList;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Optional;
018
019/** An API for building modular Java projects using conventional source file tree layouts. */
020public sealed interface Conventional {
021
022  /** Conventional module space descriptor. */
023  record Space(
024      Optional<String> name,
025      List<String> modules,
026      List<String> moduleSourcePaths,
027      List<Path> modulePaths,
028      Path destinationDirectory) {
029
030    /** Copy-and-set the specified component. */
031    private Space modulePaths(List<Path> modulePaths) {
032      return new Space(
033          name, modules, moduleSourcePaths, List.copyOf(modulePaths), destinationDirectory);
034    }
035
036    /** Copy-and-add one or more elements to the specified component. */
037    private Space withModulePath(Path path, Path... more) {
038      var modulePaths = new ArrayList<>(this.modulePaths);
039      modulePaths.add(path);
040      if (more.length > 0) modulePaths.addAll(List.of(more));
041      return modulePaths(List.copyOf(modulePaths));
042    }
043  }
044
045  /** Conventional project builder. */
046  record Builder(Bach bach, Space space) implements Conventional {
047
048    public Builder dependentSpace(String name, String... modules) {
049      if (name.equals(space.name.orElse("?")))
050        throw new IllegalArgumentException("name collision: " + name);
051
052      var dependent =
053          new BuilderFactory(bach)
054              .conventionalSpace(name, modules)
055              .space()
056              .withModulePath(getModulesDirectory());
057      return new Builder(bach, dependent);
058    }
059
060    public void grab(Grabber grabber, String... externalModules) {
061      grabber.grabExternalModules(externalModules);
062      grabber.grabMissingExternalModules();
063    }
064
065    public void compile() {
066      compile(ToolCall.Composer.identity());
067    }
068
069    public void compile(ToolCall.Composer javacComposer) {
070      compile(javacComposer, ToolCall.Composer.identity());
071    }
072
073    public void compile(ToolCall.Composer javacComposer, ToolCall.Composer jarComposer) {
074      var size = space.modules.size();
075      var plurals = size == 1 ? "" : "s";
076      var name = space.name.orElse("Java");
077      bach.logCaption("Compile %d conventional %s module%s".formatted(size, name, plurals));
078
079      var javac = ToolCall.of("javac");
080      javac.with("--module", String.join(",", space.modules));
081      javac.with("--module-source-path", String.join(File.pathSeparator, space.moduleSourcePaths));
082      if (!getModulePaths().isEmpty()) javac.with("--module-path", getModulePaths());
083      javac.with("-d", getClassesDirectory());
084      bach.run(javacComposer.apply(javac));
085
086      var jars = new ArrayList<ToolCall>();
087      for (var module : space.modules) jars.add(generateJarCall(module, jarComposer));
088      bach.run("directories", dir -> dir.with("clean").with(getModulesDirectory()));
089      jars.parallelStream().forEach(bach::run);
090    }
091
092    public void document(ToolCall.Composer javadocComposer) {
093      var api = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "documentation", "api");
094      var javadoc = ToolCall.of("javadoc");
095      javadoc.with("--module", String.join(",", space.modules));
096      javadoc.with(
097          "--module-source-path", String.join(File.pathSeparator, space.moduleSourcePaths));
098      if (!getModulePaths().isEmpty()) javadoc.with("--module-path", getModulePaths());
099      javadoc.with("-d", api);
100      bach.run(javadocComposer.apply(javadoc));
101
102      var jar =
103          ToolCall.of("jar")
104              .with("--create")
105              .with("--file", api.getParent().resolve("api.zip"))
106              .with("--no-manifest")
107              .with("-C", api, ".");
108      bach.run(jar);
109    }
110
111    public void link(ToolCall.Composer jlinkComposer) {
112      var image = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "image");
113      var jlink = ToolCall.of("jlink");
114      jlink.with("--output", image);
115      jlink.with("--add-modules", String.join(",", space.modules));
116      jlink.with("--module-path", List.of(getModulesDirectory(), bach.path().externalModules()));
117      bach.run("directories", run -> run.with("delete").with(image));
118      bach.run(jlinkComposer.apply(jlink));
119    }
120
121    public void runAllTests() {
122      var name = space.name.orElse("this");
123      bach.logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(name));
124      var moduleFinder = getRuntimeModuleFinder();
125      for (var module : space.modules) {
126        if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, module).isPresent()) {
127          runModule(moduleFinder, module, ToolCall.Composer.identity(), bach.printer()::print);
128        }
129        var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, module);
130        runTool(toolFinder, "test", ToolCall.Composer.identity(), bach.printer()::print);
131        if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
132      }
133    }
134
135    public void runModule(String module, ToolCall.Composer composer) {
136      runModule(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), module, composer, bach.printer()::print);
137    }
138
139    public void runModule(
140        ModuleFinder finder, String module, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor verifier) {
141      var call = composer.apply(ToolCall.module(finder, module));
142      var run = bach.run(call);
143      verifier.accept(run);
144    }
145
146    public void runTool(String tool, ToolCall.Composer composer) {
147      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), true);
148      runTool(toolFinder, tool, composer, bach.printer()::print);
149    }
150
151    public void runTool(
152        ToolFinder finder, String tool, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
153      for (var provider : finder.list(tool)) {
154        var singleton = ToolFinder.of(provider);
155        var call = composer.apply(ToolCall.of(singleton, tool));
156        var run = bach.run(call);
157        visitor.accept(run);
158      }
159    }
160
161    public void runJUnit(String module) {
162      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), true, module);
163      runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
164    }
165
166    public void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module) {
167      runJUnit(finder, module, ToolCall.Composer.identity(), ToolRun.Visitor.noop());
168    }
169
170    public void runJUnit(
171        ToolFinder finder, String module, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
172      var reports = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "reports", "junit", module);
173      var junit =
174          ToolCall.of(finder, "junit")
175              .with("--select-module", module)
176              .with("--reports-dir", reports);
177      var call = composer.apply(junit);
178      var run = bach.run(call);
179      visitor.accept(run);
180    }
181
182    private ToolCall generateJarCall(String module, ToolCall.Composer jarComposer) {
183      var version = findVersion(module);
184      var file =
185          version
186              .map(value -> Configuration.computeJarFileName(module, value))
187              .orElseGet(() -> module + ".jar");
188      var jar = ToolCall.of("jar");
189      jar.with("--create");
190      jar.with("--file", getModulesDirectory().resolve(file));
191      version.ifPresent(v -> jar.with("--module-version", v));
192      findMainClass(module).ifPresent(mainClass -> jar.with("--main-class", mainClass));
193      var composed = jarComposer.apply(jar);
194      composed.with("-C", getClassesDirectory().resolve(module), ".");
195      return composed;
196    }
197
198    private Optional<Version> findVersion(String module) {
199      return Optional.empty();
200    }
201
202    private Optional<String> findMainClass(String module) {
203      var name = module + ".Main";
204      var path = Path.of(name.replace('.', '/') + ".class");
205      var file = getClassesDirectory().resolve(module).resolve(path);
206      return Files.exists(file) ? Optional.of(name) : Optional.empty();
207    }
208
209    private List<Path> getModulePaths() {
210      var paths = new ArrayList<>(space.modulePaths());
211      var externalModules = bach.path().externalModules();
212      if (Files.isDirectory(externalModules) && !paths.contains(externalModules))
213        paths.add(externalModules);
214      return List.copyOf(paths);
215    }
216
217    private Path getClassesDirectory() {
218      return bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "classes");
219    }
220
221    private Path getModulesDirectory() {
222      return bach.path().workspace().resolve(space.destinationDirectory);
223    }
224
225    private ModuleFinder getRuntimeModuleFinder() {
226      var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
227      paths.add(getModulesDirectory());
228      paths.addAll(getModulePaths());
229      return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
230    }
231  }
232}
